item.description:
The Center of Light presents Master Teacher Father Peter Bowes

Where is your soul and how will you find it? Who will take you there? Everywhere you turn, you hear the "soul" mentioned; people looking for their "soul mates" and trying to discover who they are as souls. All the while, the nature and location of the soul remain unknown to so many; but not to all. At this seminar, Father Peter will awaken you to the truth about the reality of the soul, which will leave you with a new understanding that can springboard you into a real search to discover and experience your soul.

Bring a friend for free!

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Soul Searching - A Seminar with a Master Teacher
